subject: Filter improvement
msgSnippet: Request class has method public static Request method(Class clazz, String methodName); which suppose to run only methodName from the class. I think it would
messageBody:
Request class has method

public static Request method(Class<?> clazz, String methodName);

which suppose to run only methodName from the class.

I think it would be nice to have more methods thats

- receives list of methods to run from the class;
- received list of methods to exclude from the run of the class;
- both : list of methods to exclude and list of methods to include;

Perhaps support of mask should be considered. This feature will enable
to run group of related tests if their name have common pattern, that
is often the true.
